price: 19. Waxay (Rusushii) yidhaahdeen: Shareysigiinnu waa la jirkiin (waana sababta shirkigiinna iyo xume falkiinna),  ma in la idin waaniyey darteed3? Mayee, waxaad tihiin qolo xadgudub badan.
arabic: قَالُواْ طَٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمۡ أَئِن ذُكِّرۡتُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ مُّسۡرِفُونَ
footnotes: 3. Gooddinta aad noo gooddineysaan ma waxaa u sabab ah inaan wax xaq ah idiin sheegno oo idinku waaninno.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū ṭāirukum maʿakum a-in dhukkir'tum bal antum qawmun mus'rifūna
